review: Matrix can be seen as a action or fight movie, but it is much more than it. It's a new way to see (and doubt) the world, the reality. There are lots of Philosophy books about it.And also Religion books, because you can find a huge number of interpretations in the movie. Besides that, the action scenes are revolutionary and the direction is sharp. Trust me you got to see it!(And in HD)

The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.Yeah, I grew up in the 1980s. I recall the Transformers before Michael bay got his grubby little hands on them. Sure, I was more into Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, He-Man and the Ghost Busters, but I knew the Transformers... especially the big names (like Bumblebee).These were great cartoons and a great time for them. No computer animation, nothing fancy, just great artwork and a story. For some reason this film also has rocking music (and a Weird Al song called Dare to be Stupid that makes no sense in the movie or anywhere else).
